Description:
Responsible for overseeing construction project and ensuring that completed work meets the standards and specifications pre-agreed with clients. The job role of a finishing foreman involves the following duties:Liaising with colleagues and clients 
Overseeing project schedules and ensuring working is completed on time 
Monitoring budgets to avoid overspend 
Supervising construction workers and subcontractors 
Reporting on project progress to senior managers and stakeholders 
Conducting quality and safety inspections with extreme attention to details
Ensuring work is finished to the agreed standards 
Maintaining quality control checks 
Coordinating teams 
Day to day problem solving and dealing with any issues that arise 
Signing off and handing completed work over to the client Skills
Skills:
Minimum 8-10 years experience finishing works of high-end projects
An eye for details to ensure quality and safety
MS Office proficiency
Effective communication skills
Used to coordinating with teams and sub-contractors
